unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi reported a surge in stroke cases amongst young adults, particularly those aged 30-45 yrs, during the recent monsoon season. Dr. Rajesh Kumar, head of Neurology at AIIMS, attributed this rise to lifestyle factors like high stress levels and unhealthy diets. He advised regular checkups and immediate consultation in case of symptoms like sudden numbness or difficulty in speaking.
normalised: A-I-I-M-S Delhi reported a surge in stroke cases amongst young adults, particularly those aged thirty to forty five years, during the recent monsoon season. Doctor Rajesh Kumar, head of Neurology at A-I-I-M-S, attributed this rise to lifestyle factors like high stress levels and unhealthy diets. He advised regular checkups and immediate consultation in case of symptoms like sudden numbness or difficulty in speaking.

unnormalised: The hospital's neurology department saw approx. 20% increase in stroke patients compared to last year. Many cases involved individuals with no prior history of cardiovascular issues. Consultations are available Mon-Fri, 9 AM to 5 PM. Teleconsultations are also available via their website.
normalised: The hospital's neurology department saw approximately twenty percent increase in stroke patients compared to last year. Many cases involved individuals with no prior history of cardiovascular issues. Consultations are available Monday to Friday, nine A-M to five P-M. Teleconsultations are also available via their website.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, a senior neurologist, highlighted the importance of early intervention. "The 'golden hour' is crucial. If treatment begins within 4.5 hrs of symptom onset, the chances of recovery improve significantly," she emphasized. MRI and CT scans are vital diagnostic tools, costing approx. ₹5000-₹8000 respectively.
normalised: Doctor Sharma, a senior neurologist, highlighted the importance of early intervention. "The 'golden hour' is crucial. If treatment begins within four point five hours of symptom onset, the chances of recovery improve significantly," she emphasized. M-R-I and C-T scans are vital diagnostic tools, costing approximately rupee five thousand to rupee eight thousand respectively.

unnormalised: The hospital is running awareness campaigns in nearby communities, providing info on stroke prevention and recognizing early symptoms. They have also partnered with local NGOs to reach vulnerable populations. One campaign is scheduled for 15/08/2024 at the Jantar Mantar.
normalised: The hospital is running awareness campaigns in nearby communities, providing information on stroke prevention and recognizing early symptoms. They have also partnered with local N-G-Os to reach vulnerable populations. One campaign is scheduled for fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four at the Jantar Mantar.

unnormalised: AIIMS is urging people to adopt healthier lifestyles, including regular exercise and a balanced diet rich in fruits and vegetables. Avoiding smoking and limiting alcohol consumption are also strongly recommended. You can find more information on their website, aiimsdelhi.nic.in.
normalised: A-I-I-M-S is urging people to adopt healthier lifestyles, including regular exercise and a balanced diet rich in fruits and vegetables. Avoiding smoking and limiting alcohol consumption are also strongly recommended. You can find more information on their website, a-i-i-m-s-delhi dot n-i-c dot in.
